title: 好开心！
author: Spedin
txt_content: 我的积分450了！快到6级了！加油加油！你们也加油啊！

replies.author: volta薯片~
replies.txt_content: 是啊加油，窝里10级还远了去了

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
噗
我突然好悲伤 
离10级永远都是那个积分差距==

replies.author: 诺尘_
replies.txt_content: 恭喜，我也打算这两天上六级！！

replies.author: Xwan泽宛
replies.txt_content: 啊，啊，我还差2443分就⑨级了（滑稽）
我不开心
一起加油，  希望过的快乐A.A

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 加油啊~然而我离11级还是那么远

replies.author: 吊打小逗比
replies.txt_content: 我9级才一半233333

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content: 正在冲⑨的我。。。

replies.author: SMFX阜星
replies.txt_content: 为了到时发地图能@人，只求上4。。。

replies.txt_content: 6级啊，好远啊qwq

replies.author: 45gfg9
replies.txt_content:
是啊是啊
默默高兴

replies.author: hj1358188945
replies.txt_content: 加油  我也在加油！

replies.author: OldDriverWang
replies.txt_content: 我现在追求的是5级XD

replies.txt_content: 积分使楼主快乐@(Lz的签名)

replies.author: 行王
replies.txt_content: 我刚到5 正在准备上6XD

replies.author: 洫、棄
replies.txt_content: 啊 我离12级就差49907积分了

replies.author: 蚂蚁君
replies.txt_content: 我的积分还有780就可以升级了，一起加油！！

replies.txt_content: 我还在苦苦为20积分加油...

replies.txt_content:
我想上8级XD
看来是很困难了

replies.txt_content: 我还有很长的路要走
